text: Francesco Servino (Castellammare di Stabia, born May 8, 1984) is an Italian journalist and activist well known for his defense of Vesuvius National Park and archaeological sites in Vesuvian area. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Castellammare di Stabia Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian male journalists Category:Italian environmentalists Category:Italian activists
title: Francesco Servino
